category: news
title: "Cross-talk between red blood cells and plasma influences blood flow and omics phenotypes in severe COVID-19"
excerpt: "For severe COVID-19 patients' red blood cells, healthy donor plasma reduces pathological red blood cell shape alterations and improves microcapillary flow in vitro through an interaction between red blood cells and plasma."
